archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1006
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a PO, I want to know as much about a customer as possible to personalise and improve their experience

properties.value: [CLM] CLM enable to gather and engage customers via benefits, offers, rewards, vouchers, coupons as well as via integration with CCM to target personalized comni channel communication on loyalty.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
